title: Membership Requirement Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of common requirements for joining organizations in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each membership requirement (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

skill_demonstration.description: Proving practical ability in areas relevant to the organization's activities.

financial_contribution.description: Payment of dues, fees, investments, or other monetary commitments.

background_verification.description: Investigation of personal history, prior affiliations, or criminal record.

loyalty_oath.description: Formal pledge of allegiance, commitment, or dedication to the organization.

bloodline_connection.description: Family relationship to existing members or specific genetic heritage.

sponsorship.description: Endorsement by one or more existing members who vouch for the candidate.

trial_period.description: Temporary membership during which the candidate must prove their worth.

physical_testing.description: Evaluation of bodily capabilities, strength, endurance, or other physical attributes.

intelligence_assessment.description: Measurement of mental acuity, knowledge, problem-solving, or reasoning abilities.

magical_aptitude.description: Demonstration of capacity to perform, resist, or understand supernatural forces.

technological_proficiency.description: Proven ability to use, create, or maintain specific technologies.

credential_possession.description: Holding specific licenses, degrees, certifications, or formal qualifications.

character_references.description: Testimonials from trusted sources regarding the candidate's reputation or qualities.

ideological_alignment.description: Demonstrated agreement with the organization's belief system, goals, or values.

secrecy_agreement.description: Commitment to confidentiality regarding organizational information.

initiation_ritual.description: Participation in a symbolic or transformative ceremony that marks entry.

age_requirement.description: Meeting minimum or maximum age thresholds for eligibility.

resource_contribution.description: Provision of specific non-monetary assets valuable to the organization.

territory_residence.description: Living within a particular geographic area or domain.

special_attribute.description: Possessing unusual traits, abilities, or characteristics deemed valuable.

identity_verification.description: Confirmation of who the candidate claims to be through documentation or other means.

medical_screening.description: Health evaluation to confirm fitness, absence of conditions, or presence of specific traits.

psychological_evaluation.description: Assessment of mental health, personality traits, or cognitive patterns.
